AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing MessagePinner, which enables pinning of messages based on inclusion of a set trigger.
[p]help MessagePinner to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: MessagePinner
DESCRIPTION: Pins messages containing configured pin trigger text
